      • getGraphLayout

        public static Layout getGraphLayout(RestClient restClient,
                                    int graphId,
                                    int layoutId)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve layout with layoutId for a graph with graphId
        Parameters:
        restClient(RestClient) - defines the methods and other connection variables used by the Rest API
        graphId(int) - id of the graph on GraphSpace
        layoutId(int) - id of the layouts on GraphSpace
        Returns:
        Layout object returned from GraphSpace
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        offset(int) - Offset the list of returned entities by this number
        Returns:
        ArrayList of layouts for a graph
